more_content:
Whether you're organizing a family reunion, planning a wedding, or coordinating a corporate retreat, 24 North Hotel is well-equipped to meet your group accommodation needs. Our central location makes it easy for your guests to get around Key West, and our extra-comfy bedding and on-site Starbucks ensure that your group starts the day off on the right foot.

Flexible indoor meeting space comes with high-speed Wi-Fi, flat screen televisions, blackout blinds and central air-conditioning.

Conveniently located in New Town, 24 North Hotel has 145 guest rooms and a shuttle to Old Town. This way you and guests don’t have to worry about transportation or parking and can enjoy the ease of our shuttle services. Is your group interested in water sports? Our on-site Fury Watersports concierge is here to help you choose which excursion is best for you and your group.

Likewise, our on-site amenities ensures that your attendees will have everything they need to meet and enjoy their time in Key West. With plenty of food & beverage options, guests can relax poolside and enjoy fresh food and cocktails. Our popular poolside bar, the Toasted Coconut, has all your drink needs met, as well as a food options. Within steps is The Blind Pig food truck, which is permanently parked at our sister hotel, The Gates.

Our spotless rooms offer desks and high-speed WiFi, so even after group meetings, guests can comfortably work.

Aside from 24 North Hotel, Key West has proven to be a desirable destination for company retreats. Its laid-back atmosphere, rich history and funky features make for a positive setting for you and your peers.

Our Group Sales Department is eager to plan your meetings and events from beginning to end. More information on group stays and rates here.

To find out more, complete an RFP or contact Sales@thekeyscollection.com.

--

Booking a group retreat? Check out our special offers.
